verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> with the <S%H4557>number<s%> of their <S%H8034>names,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls;<s%>

From <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>

And <S%H854>with<s%> you there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4294>tribe;<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you: of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben;<s%> <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur.<s%>
Of <S%H8095>Simeon;<s%> <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai.<s%>
Of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab.<s%>
Of <S%H3485>Issachar;<s%> <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar.<s%>
Of <S%H2074>Zebulun;<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud:<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur.<s%>
Of <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni.<s%>
Of <S%H1835>Dan;<s%> <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai.<s%>
Of <S%H836>Asher;<s%> <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ocran.<s%>
Of <S%H1410>Gad;<s%> <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel.<s%>
Of <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the <S%H7121>renowned<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by their names: <S%H8034><s%>

And they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> together on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> and they declared their <S%H3205>pedigrees<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls.<s%>
As <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> eldest <S%H1060>son,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> were threescore and <S%H7657>fourteen<s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> namely, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>
Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> were <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> by their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> throughout their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war;<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, even of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are those that were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> being <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

So <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

Even <S%H3605>all<s%> they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>
But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> after the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>number<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

But <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and <S%H5921>over<s%> all <S%H3605>things<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> belong to it: <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof; and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto it, and shall <S%H2583>encamp<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> setteth <S%H5265>forward,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall take it <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H853><s%> and when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> is to be <S%H2583>pitched,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall set it <S%H6965>up:<s%> <S%H853><s%> and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that cometh <S%H7131>nigh<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall pitch their <S%H2583>tents,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> his own <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> his own <S%H1714>standard,<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> that there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>
